task: Explore the ModelFieldEditor page to customize card fields.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when fufu successfully accesses the ModelFieldEditor page and interacts with the customizable card fields.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has content_desc "主页"

By touching the button with content_desc "主页," the screen changed from displaying various text and buttons related to Anki to focusing on the "Shared Decks" page with different language options and categories for shared decks.
Touch on a button that has text "Apps"
By touching the "Apps" button, the screen has changed to display information about AnkiWeb, including details about the app and its features.
Touch on a button that has text "Download"
By touching the "Download" button, the screen now displays additional information about downloading Anki for different platforms and provides links for installation guides and troubleshooting.
Press "BACK" button to navigate back

Navigating back from the "SharedDecks" screen, the button with the content description "收起" has been replaced by a button with the content description "转到上一层级," and a new button with the content description "牌组搜索" has appeared. Additionally, a textview with the text "下载牌组" is now displayed on the screen.

The actions taken so far have not led fufu to the ModelFieldEditor page to customize card fields. fufu needs to explore the "转到上一层级" button to navigate to a different screen that might contain the ModelFieldEditor page.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "转到上一层级"

By touching the button with content description "转到上一层级," the screen changed from the "SharedDecks" page to the "DeckPicker" page, where new options like "打开侧栏" and "更多选项" are now visible. (page changed from SharedDecks to DeckPicker)
Touch on a button that has content_desc "更多选项"
By touching the button with the content description "更多选项," the options in the DeckPicker screen have been expanded to include buttons for "检查," "恢复备份," "笔记类型," "导入牌组," and "导出."
Touch on a button that has text "笔记类型"

By touching the button with the text "笔记类型," you have navigated to the "ManageNotetypes" screen where you can see a list of different note types and options to manage them. (page changed from DeckPicker to ManageNotetypes)
Touch on a button that has text "编辑卡片"

Upon touching the "编辑卡片" button, the screen transitioned from managing note types to the card template editor screen. The screen now displays options to save, preview, and access more settings for editing card templates, including toggling between front and back sides of the card. (page changed from ManageNotetypes to CardTemplateEditor)
The actions taken so far have been appropriate, leading fufu to the CardTemplateEditor page effectively.

Fill a textfield that has text "{{#标题}}
{{标题}}
{{/标题}}
{{标题}}
{{/标题}}[NEWLINE]
{{cloze:遮盖}}
[NEWLINE]
[NEWLINE]
Hi, I'm fufu, a 25-year-old graduate student studying computer science.
"
The textfield content has been expanded to include a new line with additional text, and the textfield is now focused with the updated content visible for editing.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "保存"

By touching on the button with content description "保存," the screen transitioned from the CardTemplateEditor to ManageNotetypes. The "保存" button is no longer visible, and new options for managing note types have appeared on the screen. (page changed from CardTemplateEditor to ManageNotetypes)
